entry.string: The group #(1) is the default group for new users. If you want to remove it change the appropriate configuration setting first.
entry.translation: Zee gruoop #(1) is zee deffoolt gruoop fur noo users. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff yuoo vunt tu remufe-a it chunge-a zee epprupreeete-a cunffeegooreshun setteeng furst. Um de hur de hur de hur.
